content: @Sherry Lake and I just got off the call with OSF and others, the call we've been talking about at https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/ZXi0J1ZAvV0/m/s_E5XO8kAgAJ

I would love them to just fix the Dataverse integration (and not call it storage).

It might be impossible to get all the repositories connected. Bags/ OAI-PMH would be OK, but still missing key (cool) features of Dataverse.

And for UVA Security folks, we need that pop-up publish text (if published from OSF), but maybe publish will need to be on the Dataverse-side only.

The integration of "all" repositories into one "add-on", would definitely water down the usefulness of Dataverse.

Yes, how would they be able to authenticate each and every repo? That is if the user keeps control, which I think they should.

As I said, I have lots of opinions.
Ha, well we don't want watered down integrations. I guess we'll see.
It was interesting to hear about harvesting use cases.
@Sherry Lake do you happen to have any notes from that call? I don't seem to have taken any. (Or maybe mine are on a paper somewhere. :sweat_smile: )

Never mind! Found them on paper. Typing them up at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1_pZlL2BMX6eLpJ53_QB1c-iL51-290hehkmmxPXpNvU/edit?usp=sharing

Comments are welcome.
Found mine. Will add if I need to.
